roleset.name: make a pile
roleset.note: PILE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pile' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from pile.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: explicit mention of pile, or destination/location

example.name: all args
example.text: In 1987, KKR for the second time piled debt onto Storer's TV stations, selling them for $1.3 billion to a new entity that was 45%-owned by KKR and 55%-owned by Gillett Corp., which now operates the SCI TV stations.
example.arg: selling them for $1.3 billion to a new entity that was 45%-owned by KKR and 55%-owned by Gillett Corp, which now operates the SCI TV stations

example.name: ergative
example.text: Now, though, enormous costs for earthquake relief will pile on top of outstanding costs for hurricane relief.
example.arg: on top of outstanding costs for hurricane relief
